title: Automated K8s Git Ops Framework
summary: A GitOps framework for Kubernetes that automates deployment and management of applications using Git as the source of truth.
details: Designed and implemented a GitOps framework that integrates with Kubernetes, allowing for seamless deployment and management of applications. The framework includes features such as automated syncing, rollback capabilities, and support for multiple environments. It also provides a user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing deployments.

title: Infrastructure Self-Repair Automation
summary: Intercepts critical alerts and runs safe, staged remediation; reports outcomes back to engineers.
details: Interprets alerts, validates impact, and executes staged actions (restart → reboot → redeploy) with guardrails, audit logs, and rollback/escalation paths. Includes post-action verification and status reporting.

title: Global FSxN Replication Fabric
summary: Enterprise-grade multi-region SnapMirror replication architecture designed for controlled RPO/RTO across cloud and on-prem environments.
details: Designed for controlled RPO/RTO with operational runbooks: lifecycle orchestration, break/glue workflows, health checks, and repeatable promotion/failback. Built to scale across accounts/regions.

title: Golden Image Pipelines (CIS-hardened)
summary: Automated AMI pipelines with CIS hardening, validation, scheduled rebuilds, and multi-account distribution.
details: Quarterly rebuild cadence with security baselines, test gates, and versioned release promotion. Outputs consistent artifacts across regions and accounts with minimal manual input.

title: LLM-Assisted Log Parsing & Ops Routing
summary: High-volume log parsing that detects failure patterns and routes findings into tickets and/or automation actions.
details: Improves time-to-signal by clustering noisy logs, extracting probable root causes, and generating actionable summaries. Supports routing to ticket queues and optional safe automated remediations.

title: Automation in Unity License Provisioning
summary: Build of workflow to automate provisioning of Unity licenses for new hires, reducing manual effort and onboarding time.
details: Developed a system that integrates wtih AD and Unity's licensing platform to automatically allocate and manage licenses based on employee status.

title: Automated Security Patch Management
summary: Implementation of an automated system to manage security patches across all servers, ensuring timely updates and compliance.
details: Designed and deployed a patch management solution that scans for vulnerabilities, schedules patch deployments, and provides reporting on compliance status.

title: Cloud Cost Optimization Dashboard
summary: Development of a dashboard to monitor and optimize cloud costs, providing insights and recommendations for cost-saving opportunities.
details: Created a dashboard that aggregates cloud usage data, identifies cost trends, and offers actionable recommendations to reduce expenses while maintaining performance. Took advantage of AWS Cost Explorer APIs and implemented custom visualizations for better decision-making.
